Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its immense worth of $1500000 to you, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1400000. This offer is tailored to provide you with exceptional value while ensuring a profitable transaction for me. I am confident that this product will meet all your expectations and contribute to your business growth. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,400,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,400,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
